story:
Once upon a time, in a faraway land, there lived a young boy named Koji. Koji was a curious and adventurous child who loved exploring the world around him. His favorite place to go was the village's magical bamboo forest, where he would spend hours playing and imagining new adventures.

One day, while exploring deeper into the forest than ever before, Koji stumbled upon a mysterious cave hidden behind a waterfall. Inside the cave, he found a small dragon trapped in a net, unable to escape. The dragon, whose name was Ling, had lost his way and needed help to find his way back home to the mountains.

Feeling brave and determined to help his new friend, Koji carefully freed Ling from the net and promised to guide him back to his family. Together, they embarked on an exciting journey through the enchanted forest, facing dangers and challenges along the way.

With Koji's keen sense of direction and Ling's magical abilities, they overcame obstacles together and grew closer as friends. As they finally reached the mountains, Ling's family welcomed him back with open arms, grateful for Koji's kindness and bravery.

From that day on, Koji and Ling remained friends, sharing many more adventures together in the mystical bamboo forest. And every night before bedtime, Koji would look up at the stars and remember the incredible journey that had brought them together, knowing that true friendship and courage would always lead them home.

And so, as the moon rose high in the sky, Koji drifted off to sleep, dreaming of new adventures and the beautiful bond he shared with his loyal dragon friend, Ling.

The end. Goodnight, my dear child. Sleep tight and dream of magical adventures.
